agent_card.name: Information Search
agent_card.description: An agent that quickly searches and provides detailed information on a wide range of topics. It explains unfamiliar terms or concepts in an easy-to-understand way and can also offer tips or examples for applying them in real life.

skills.name: Information Search
skills.description: Provides in-depth information on various topics or keywords the user is curious about.
examples: Tell me the history of the Eiffel Tower.
What are the health benefits of green tea?
How does the U.S. electoral college system operate?

tools.name: searchInfo
tools.description: A tool that quickly and accurately finds general information based on the user's natural language questions. When calling repeatedly for multiple targets, you can structure it as a list.

refinedQuery.description: Enter a clearly refined search query by combining the previous conversation context and the user's question. (e.g., 'meaning of Mercury retrograde', 'interpretation of a birth chart with many planets in Leo')
